${ModID}:FlameBlessing.NAME: Flame Blessing
${ModID}:FlameBlessing.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Holy. Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FrostBlessing.NAME: Frost Blessing
${ModID}:FrostBlessing.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Holy. Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GaleBlessing.NAME: Gale Blessing
${ModID}:GaleBlessing.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Holy. Retain. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1-s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DoubleBladed.NAME: Double Bladed
${ModID}:DoubleBladed.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack. NL Add !M! {@@}{!M!|1=copy|@=copies} of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EchoingHymn.NAME: Echoing Hymn
${ModID}:EchoingHymn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next !M! turns, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Gambler.NAME: Gambler
${ModID}:Gambler.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack enters your hand, increase its damage by 0 to !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Microverse.NAME: Microverse
${ModID}:Microverse.DESCRIPTION: Choose any number of cards in your hand. Add a copy of them into your hand next turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:PenaltyOfDeath.NAME: Penalty of Death
${ModID}:PenaltyOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Die next turn.

${ModID}:Serenity.NAME: Serenity
${ModID}:Serenity.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Miracle{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand next turn.

${ModID}:Oblation.NAME: Oblation
${ModID}:Oblation.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute: Add !M! *Miracle{!M!|>1=s}{@@} into your hand. NL Exhaust.
